title: Plants vs. Zombies v6.1.11
description:
Get ready to soil your plants as a mob of fun-loving zombies is about to invade your home. Use your arsenal of 49 zombie-zapping plants â€” Peashooters, Wall-nuts, Cherry Bombs and more â€” to mulchify 26 types of zombies before they break down your door.

One of the top tower-defense action games ever, Plants vs. Zombiesâ„¢ features zombies with their own special skills, so you'll need to think fast and plant faster to have a successful strategy and combat them all. 

But be careful how you use your limited supply of greens and seeds â€” as you dash to battle the fun-dead, obstacles like a setting sun, creeping fog and a swimming pool add to the challenge.

Game Features

â€¢ Conquer zombies in all 50 levels of Adventure mode â€” through day, night and fog, in a swimming pool and on the rooftop
â€¢ Battle 26 types of zombies including Pole-Vaulters, Snorkelers and Bucketheads, each with its own special skills
â€¢ Earn 49 powerful perennial plants and collect coins to buy a pet snail, power-ups and more
â€¢ Open the Almanac to see all the plants and zombies, plus amusing "facts" and quotes
â€¢ Collect 47 fun-dead achievements and show off your zombie-zapping prowess
â€¢ Enjoy all the zombie-zapping fun of the hit PC/Mac game â€” fully optimized for Android
â€¢ Hilarious graphics, great soundtrack and a bonus music video
â€¢ Need coins for great new stuff? Buy up to 600,000 coins right from the Main Menu
â€¢ Includes all the mini-games and the full features of the original game
â€¢ Made by PopCap, the creators of Bejeweled, the #1 puzzle game in the world

Download today to stem a zombie attack on your Android device!

Whats new:

Hello zombie battlers! In this update, weâ€™ve unleashed fun-dead approval for Android Lollipop 5.0 and Marshmallow 6.0. Thanks, as always, for playing!

More info:
 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.popcap.pvz_row


Instructions:

1.Copy 'com.popcap.pvz_row' folder to 'sdcard/Android/obb'
2.Install APK
3.Launch the game
